project.name: Antigravity Auth
project.tagline: Authentication Made Easy for Claude & Gemini
project.description: Access Claude Opus 4.5, Sonnet 4.5, and Gemini 3 Pro/Flash directly using Google OAuth credentials—no API Key required. Features multi-account load balancing and automatic session recovery.

features.title: Why Antigravity Auth?
features.subtitle: Eliminate the hassle of manual API Key configuration. Automate quota management. Built for high-concurrency development.

list.title: No API Key Required
list.desc: Skip expensive API Keys. Authenticate directly with your Google account credentials in one click.

list.title: Multi-Account Load Balancing
list.desc: Automatically rotate up to 10 Google accounts with intelligent request distribution. Say goodbye to rate limits.

list.title: Thinking Model Support
list.desc: Full support for Claude and Gemini 3 thinking modes with configurable budgets. Unlock deep reasoning capabilities.

list.title: Automatic Session Recovery
list.desc: Tool call failed? Session interrupted? The plugin automatically retries and restores context—no manual intervention needed.

list.title: Plugin Compatibility
list.desc: Seamlessly integrates with popular plugins like oh-my-opencode and DCP.

list.title: Dual Quota System
list.desc: Maximize both free and paid quota pools provided by Google.
